sentences.en: A bosom friend afar brings a distant land near.
sentences.cn: 海内存知己,天涯若比邻.

sentences.en: A dim light came from afar.
sentences.cn: 一缕暗淡的光线从远处射来.

sentences.en: Afar off he heard the squawking of caribou calves.
sentences.cn: 他听到远处有一群小驯鹿尖叫的声音.

sentences.en: Fame like a river is narrowest at its source and broadest afar off.
sentences.cn: 名誉如江河,源头最狭窄,远处最宽阔.

sentences.en: Fauchery, afar off, amused himself by following this delicate negotiation.
sentences.cn: 浮式瑞在远远地用眼睛看着他们这个难办的交涉,暗地里在开心.

sentences.en: He stands firmly at the top of a gigantic rock gazing afar.
sentences.cn: 他正一动不动地站在这悬空巨石的顶端,凝着神,敛着翅.

sentences.en: In the photo she stands in the attitude of a sailor looking afar.
sentences.cn: 在照片中,她摆出水手伫立远望的姿势.

sentences.en: Is it not delightful to have friends coming from afar?
sentences.cn: 有朋自远方来,不亦乐乎?

sentences.en: Seen from afar, its towering buildings beckon the visitor in.
sentences.cn: 从远处看，它高耸的大楼召唤着拜访者进去。

sentences.en: The petrel came winnowing in from afar on the sea.
sentences.cn: 海燕从遥远的地方振翼飞来.

sentences.en: We had visitors who came from afar.

sentences.cn: 我们听到远处有喊叫声.
